author: Simon Difford
description: A Mojito with a touch of cherry. Beware, this is no cherry bomb and those looking for something fruitier and sweeter should add 2.5 to 5ml (½ to 1 barspoon) sugar syrup.
name: Cherry Mojito
recipeIngredient: 40 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of glass (just to bruise)
Add the next 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice
TOP with soda, briefly churn and serve
